display_html:
data Command
  • = Test !TestOptions
  • | Validate !ValidateOptions
  • | Curl !CurlOptions
name: Command Test Validate Curl

display_html:
data TestOptions = TestOptions {
  • testSpecPath :: !FilePath
  • testBaseUrl :: !Text
  • testCount :: !Int
  • testInclude :: ![Text]
  • testExclude :: ![Text]
  • testTags :: ![Text]
  • testNegative :: !Bool
  • testAuthHeader :: !(Maybe Text)
  • testOutputFormat :: !OutputFormat
  • testSeed :: !(Maybe Int)
  • testTimeout :: !(Maybe Int)
  • testWorkers :: !Int
  • testWorkdir :: !WorkdirOption
  • testStreamingTimeout :: !(Maybe Int)
  • testMaxResponseTime :: !(Maybe Int)
  • testStateful :: !Bool
  • testMaxSequenceLength :: !Int
}
name: TestOptions TestOptions testSpecPath testBaseUrl testCount testInclude testExclude testTags testNegative testAuthHeader testOutputFormat testSeed testTimeout testWorkers testWorkdir testStreamingTimeout testMaxResponseTime testStateful testMaxSequenceLength

display_html:
data CurlOptions = CurlOptions {
  • curlSpecPath :: !FilePath
  • curlBaseUrl :: !Text
  • curlCount :: !Int
  • curlInclude :: ![Text]
  • curlExclude :: ![Text]
  • curlTags :: ![Text]
}
name: CurlOptions CurlOptions curlSpecPath curlBaseUrl curlCount curlInclude curlExclude curlTags

display_html:
data ApiRequest = ApiRequest {
  • reqMethod :: Method
  • reqPath :: Text
  • reqQueryParams :: [(Text, Text)]
  • reqHeaders :: [(HeaderName, ByteString)]
  • reqBody :: Maybe (MediaType, ByteString)
}
name: ApiRequest ApiRequest reqMethod reqPath reqQueryParams reqHeaders reqBody

display_html:
data ApiResponse = ApiResponse {
  • resStatusCode :: Int
  • resHeaders :: [(HeaderName, ByteString)]
  • resBody :: ByteString
  • resTime :: NominalDiffTime
}
name: ApiResponse ApiResponse resStatusCode resHeaders resBody resTime

display_html: queryToMaybe :: (Text, Text) -> (Text, Maybe Text)
name: queryToMaybe

display_html: genFromPatternWithLength :: Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe (Gen Text)
name: genFromPatternWithLength

display_html:
data TestCaseResult = TestCaseResult {
  • tcrName :: !Text
  • tcrPassed :: !Bool
  • tcrTime :: !NominalDiffTime
  • tcrFailureMessage :: !(Maybe Text)
  • tcrTestCount :: !Int
}
name: TestCaseResult TestCaseResult tcrName tcrPassed tcrTime tcrFailureMessage tcrTestCount

display_html:
data TestSuiteResult = TestSuiteResult {
  • tsrName :: !Text
  • tsrTests :: ![TestCaseResult]
  • tsrTime :: !NominalDiffTime
}
name: TestSuiteResult TestSuiteResult tsrName tsrTests tsrTime

display_html:
data Schema = Schema {
  • schemaType :: Maybe SchemaType
  • schemaEnum :: Maybe [Value]
  • schemaConst :: Maybe Value
  • schemaMinLength :: Maybe Int
  • schemaMaxLength :: Maybe Int
  • schemaMinimum :: Maybe Double
  • schemaMaximum :: Maybe Double
  • schemaExclusiveMinimum :: Maybe Double
  • schemaExclusiveMaximum :: Maybe Double
  • schemaPattern :: Maybe Text
  • schemaItems :: Maybe Schema
  • schemaMinItems :: Maybe Int
  • schemaMaxItems :: Maybe Int
  • schemaUniqueItems :: Bool
  • schemaRequired :: [Text]
  • schemaProperties :: Map Text Schema
  • schemaAdditionalProperties :: Maybe AdditionalProperties
  • schemaAllOf :: [Schema]
  • schemaAnyOf :: [Schema]
  • schemaOneOf :: [Schema]
  • schemaNullable :: Bool
}
name: Schema Schema schemaType schemaEnum schemaConst schemaMinLength schemaMaxLength schemaMinimum schemaMaximum schemaExclusiveMinimum schemaExclusiveMaximum schemaPattern schemaItems schemaMinItems schemaMaxItems schemaUniqueItems schemaRequired schemaProperties schemaAdditionalProperties schemaAllOf schemaAnyOf schemaOneOf schemaNullable

display_html:
data SchemaType
  • = SString
  • | SInteger
  • | SNumber
  • | SBoolean
  • | SArray
  • | SObject
  • | SNull
name: SchemaType SString SInteger SNumber SBoolean SArray SObject SNull

display_html:
data ResolvedParam = ResolvedParam {
  • rpName :: Text
  • rpLocation :: ParamLocation
  • rpRequired :: Bool
  • rpSchema :: Schema
}
name: ResolvedParam ResolvedParam rpName rpLocation rpRequired rpSchema

display_html:
data ResolvedRequestBody = ResolvedRequestBody {
  • rbContentType :: Text
  • rbSchema :: Schema
}
name: ResolvedRequestBody ResolvedRequestBody rbContentType rbSchema

display_html:
data ResponseSpec = ResponseSpec {
  • rsContent :: Map Text Schema
  • rsHeaders :: Map Text Schema
  • rsRequiredHeaders :: [Text]
}
name: ResponseSpec ResponseSpec rsContent rsHeaders rsRequiredHeaders

display_html:
data ResolvedOperation = ResolvedOperation {
  • roMethod :: Text
  • roPath :: Text
  • roOperationId :: Maybe Text
  • roTags :: [Text]
  • roParameters :: [ResolvedParam]
  • roRequestBody :: Maybe ResolvedRequestBody
  • roResponses :: Map Int ResponseSpec
  • roDefaultResponse :: Maybe ResponseSpec
  • roSecurity :: [SecurityRequirement]
  • roIsStreaming :: Bool
  • roTimeout :: Maybe Int
}
name: ResolvedOperation ResolvedOperation roTimeout roMethod roPath roOperationId roTags roParameters roRequestBody roResponses roDefaultResponse roSecurity roIsStreaming

display_html:
data Check = Check {
  • checkName :: Text
  • checkRun :: ApiRequest -> ApiResponse -> ResolvedOperation -> CheckResult
}
name: Check Check checkName checkRun

display_html:
data FailureDetail = FailureDetail {
  • fdCheck :: Text
  • fdMessage :: Text
  • fdRequest :: ApiRequest
  • fdResponse :: ApiResponse
  • fdOperation :: Text
  • fdSchemaErrors :: [Text]
  • fdSchemaDiff :: Maybe Text
  • fdMutation :: Maybe Text
}
name: FailureDetail FailureDetail fdCheck fdMessage fdRequest fdResponse fdOperation fdSchemaErrors fdSchemaDiff fdMutation

display_html:
newtype AuthConfig = AuthConfig {
  • authValues :: Map Text AuthValue
}
name: AuthConfig AuthConfig authValues

display_html:
data AuthValue
  • = AuthBearer !Text
  • | AuthBasic !Text !Text
  • | AuthApiKey !Text
name: AuthValue AuthBearer AuthBasic AuthApiKey

display_html: convertSchema :: (Reference -> Maybe Schema) -> Schema -> Schema
name: convertSchema

display_html: genConstOrEnum :: Schema -> Gen Value -> Gen Value
name: genConstOrEnum

display_html: failureDetail :: Text -> Text -> [Text] -> Maybe Text -> ApiRequest -> ApiResponse -> ResolvedOperation -> FailureDetail
name: failureDetail

display_html: pickSchema :: Maybe Text -> Map Text Schema -> Maybe Schema
name: pickSchema

display_html: normalizeMapKeys :: (Text -> Text) -> Map Text a -> Map Text a
name: normalizeMapKeys

display_html: normalizeContent :: Map Text Schema -> Map Text Schema
name: normalizeContent

display_html: matchesContentType :: Text -> Map Text Schema -> Bool
name: matchesContentType

display_html:
data TestState = TestState {
  • tsExtractedValues :: Map Text Value
  • tsCreatedResources :: [ResourceRef]
  • tsHistory :: [(Text, ApiRequest, ApiResponse)]
}
name: TestState TestState tsExtractedValues tsCreatedResources tsHistory

display_html:
data ResourceRef = ResourceRef {
  • rrOperationId :: Text
  • rrResourcePath :: Text
  • rrIdentifiers :: Map Text Value
}
name: ResourceRef ResourceRef rrOperationId rrResourcePath rrIdentifiers

display_html:
data OperationLink = OperationLink {
  • olSourceOperation :: Text
  • olTargetOperation :: Text
  • olParameterBindings :: [ParameterBinding]
  • olDescription :: Maybe Text
  • olLinkName :: Maybe Text
}
name: OperationLink OperationLink olSourceOperation olTargetOperation olParameterBindings olDescription olLinkName

display_html:
data ValueSource
  • = FromResponseBody JsonPath
  • | FromResponseHeader Text
  • | FromState Text
  • | Literal Value
name: ValueSource Literal FromResponseBody FromResponseHeader FromState

display_html:
data SequenceStep = SequenceStep {
  • ssOperationId :: Text
  • ssParamBindings :: Map Text ValueSource
}
name: SequenceStep SequenceStep ssOperationId ssParamBindings

display_html: parseRuntimeExpression :: Text -> Either Text (Text, Maybe Text)
name: parseRuntimeExpression

display_html:
data StatefulCheck = StatefulCheck {
  • scName :: Text
  • scRun :: ExecutorWithTimeout -> [ResolvedOperation] -> TestState -> IO [StatefulCheckResult]
}
name: StatefulCheck StatefulCheck scName scRun

display_html:
data StatefulCheckResult
  • = StatefulCheckPassed {
    • scrCheckName :: Text
    • scrResource :: Maybe ResourceRef
    }
  • | StatefulCheckFailed StatefulFailure
name: StatefulCheckResult StatefulCheckPassed scrCheckName scrResource StatefulCheckFailed

display_html:
data StatefulFailure = StatefulFailure {
  • sfCheckName :: Text
  • sfMessage :: Text
  • sfResource :: ResourceRef
  • sfVerificationRequest :: Maybe ApiRequest
  • sfVerificationResponse :: Maybe ApiResponse
  • sfExpectedStatus :: Maybe Int
  • sfActualStatus :: Maybe Int
}
name: StatefulFailure StatefulFailure sfCheckName sfMessage sfResource sfVerificationRequest sfVerificationResponse sfExpectedStatus sfActualStatus

display_html:
data NegativeMutation
  • = RemoveRequiredPath !Text
  • | RemoveRequiredHeader !Text
  • | RemoveRequiredQuery !Text
  • | InvalidPathParam !Text
  • | InvalidHeader !Text
  • | InvalidQueryParam !Text
  • | InvalidRequestBody
  • | InvalidContentType
name: NegativeMutation InvalidHeader RemoveRequiredPath RemoveRequiredHeader RemoveRequiredQuery InvalidPathParam InvalidQueryParam InvalidRequestBody InvalidContentType

display_html:
data TestConfig = TestConfig {
  • tcChecks :: ![Check]
  • tcAuthConfig :: !(Maybe AuthConfig)
  • tcBaseUrl :: !(Maybe BaseUrl)
  • tcPropertyCount :: !Int
  • tcNegativeTesting :: !Bool
  • tcOperationFilter :: !(ResolvedOperation -> Bool)
  • tcHeaders :: ![(HeaderName, ByteString)]
  • tcStreamingTimeout :: !(Maybe Int)
  • tcStatefulTesting :: !Bool
  • tcStatefulChecks :: ![StatefulCheck]
  • tcMaxSequenceLength :: !Int
  • tcCleanupOnFailure :: !Bool
}
name: TestConfig TestConfig tcStreamingTimeout tcChecks tcAuthConfig tcBaseUrl tcPropertyCount tcNegativeTesting tcOperationFilter tcHeaders tcStatefulTesting tcStatefulChecks tcMaxSequenceLength tcCleanupOnFailure

display_html: specForAppIO :: TestConfig -> OpenApi -> Application -> IO (Spec, [Text])
name: specForAppIO
